plot: A poor father makes monumental efforts to get money to keep his phone installed, so he can get word on his critically injured little daughter.
title: Chicago Calling
plot_es: A poor father makes monumental efforts to get money to keep his phone installed, so he can get word on his critically injured little daughter.
plot_en: A poor father makes monumental efforts to get money to keep his phone installed, so he can get word on his critically injured little daughter.
